home.title: San Francisco Bay Area Traditional Chinese Medicine Association
home.description: Dedicated to promoting Traditional Chinese Medicine and serving the Bay Area community

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Currently in Preparation - Launching 2025
about.missionText: To promote the practice and understanding of Traditional Chinese Medicine in the San Francisco Bay Area through education, community outreach, and professional collaboration.
about.visionText: To be the leading voice for Traditional Chinese Medicine practitioners in the Bay Area, fostering excellence in practice and expanding access to holistic healthcare.
about.value1Text: Maintaining the highest standards of Traditional Chinese Medicine practice and ethics.
about.value2Text: Providing accessible healthcare and education to diverse communities.
about.value3Text: Supporting continuous learning and growth for TCM practitioners.
about.historyText: Currently in our preparation stage, we are bringing together passionate TCM practitioners to build a strong professional community. Our association is being formed to serve the diverse Bay Area community and will officially launch in 2025.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive Traditional Chinese Medicine Care
services.acupunctureDesc: Traditional needle therapy for pain relief, stress management, and overall wellness.
services.herbalMedicineDesc: Customized herbal formulas tailored to individual health needs and conditions.
services.tuinaDesc: Therapeutic Chinese massage for musculoskeletal and internal medicine conditions.
services.cuppingDesc: Ancient therapy using suction cups to improve blood flow and reduce pain.
services.moxibustionDesc: Heat therapy using mugwort herb to stimulate acupuncture points and boost immunity.
services.dietaryDesc: Nutritional guidance based on TCM principles for optimal health and healing.

members.title: Our Members
members.subtitle: Certified Traditional Chinese Medicine Practitioners
members.intro: Our association proudly represents over 200 licensed TCM practitioners across the Bay Area.
members.benefit1Desc: Connect with fellow practitioners and share knowledge.
members.benefit2Desc: Access to workshops, seminars, and training programs.
members.benefit3Desc: Representation in healthcare policy and community outreach.
members.benefit4Desc: Practice management resources and clinical guidelines.
members.joinUsText: Become part of the premier TCM professional community in the Bay Area.

news.title: News & Events
news.subtitle: Stay Updated with Our Latest Activities
news.noEvents: No upcoming events at this time. Check back soon!
